name: Kevin Sutherland
text: This papa John's is awesome. So much better than north Ogden. The people here seem to take pride in the pie they make. Never had to wait . pizza always cooked perfect. Come see James for the best pizza of your life. 5 stars definitely

name: Jessica Stewart
text: This place sucked the staff sucked had their friends sitting at the tables and where more focused on them then the customers. Only had one person than when the other one came back she didn't wash her hands very well nor did they pay …More

name: SweatyCo
text: Ordered off grubhub my food never arrived after getting all the details that is was being made and was off for delivery, I was standing outside when it said deliver and no one ever showed up with the food. Don't waste your time and money. I had tipped the driver generously as well. What a waste of $40.

name: Scott E.
text: This location is closed again! Couldn't order from this store on the app or from the internet. I ordered in Roy and asked employees there what was up and they replied that the Riverdale store closed for unknown reasons. Needed better management in my opinion.

name: Samantha Allen
text: Oh. My. Gooooooodness. It's like some sort of alternate reality where everyone moves in super slow motion. Delivery on Friday night is literally faster than picking it up here.

name: Draven Ricards
text: Worst papa johns ever, I ordered they told me 35-45 mins 2 hours later still wasn’t here , called the store and talked to Dylan the manager and he was a total jerk very rude very unprofessional. Told him I don’t want it and didn’t offer any …More

name: Ignorant19
text: Used to have the best pizza.... Dominoes upped their game.  Papa John's better react... And quick.

name: Corby B.
text: Great pizza. As to order every time.

name: richard rodicio
text: Polite, punctual, informative and provide excellellent customer service. Make a really mean delicious pizza. I will go to only one pizza establishment, "Papa Johns" the only pizza.

name: Mark Armstrong
text: Ohhhhhh my goodness this place is fantastic, great food,and the staff couldn't be any better they were super fast. I TOTALLY RECOMMEND THEM

name: Tim N.
text: I hope they start paying attention to the pizzas coming out, because the last two times I have gotten pizza there it was under cooked.  I called them to see how to finish cooking it and they had no idea.  I work in retail and I am aware …More

name: Dennis Ray
text: I've always liked Papa John's Pizza from the very first time I had it about 20 years ago. This particular one is inside a gas starion, but you get the same pizza you've come to expect from Papa John's.

name: Danielle Smith
text: Since the corporate tax was lowered and the ACA has basically been repealed I figured that I would give them a try since their founder kept indicating that paying for health insurance for employees and paying federal taxes is running him …More

name: Dunk Lee Auto
text: We LOVE papa Johns! They treat us right and have great prices! We get pizza from them a few times a month.  Thanks for operating a great business and giving a good product. …More

name: Antonio M Nieto
text: i like it here good pizza if u have tony make it he knows what hes doing

name: michael albright
text: A little understaffed when I was there. The pizza was good and hot so other than staffing, no complaints.

name: Austin Chritofferson
text: Unfortunately this is the closest location that will deliver to me. This papa johns is absolutely horrible! Every single time I’ve ordered it has taken over 1.5 hours to get my pizza! Their excuse is always that they don’t have any drivers. …More

name: AJ Onesirb
text: When it comes to pizza, Pap Johns tends to be one of the best (for delivery-style).  The pizza was good, but nothing too special and the service was fairly quick, but there was a charge for ordering online.  Above average.

name: Kevin Twingstrom
text: Great service!  They messed up my order and when I went back they made me fresh pizzas, refunded me, AND gave me a coupon for another free pizza.  That's great service.  Only messed up once, I go here all the time.

name: brittany Everton
text: Ordered a pizza at least 2 hours ago and it's yet to arrive. I've called multiple times and every time they say it's on its way. Should be there soon. I want my money back. This is ridiculous. Not once have they called to give an update or …More

name: Kelvin Sanchez
text: This specific Papa John's is the reason why I buy Papa John's pizza. I have tried other locations and they are no where near as good. They also have really good service.

name: Steve Lee
text: Riverdale location not in the app to order. Tried to call them to only get a voicemail saying their location in riverdale is now open with no answer for for 5 mins. No wonder this store shut down before you can’t order from here!!!!

name: Brendan Ralston
text: Pretty slow so order ahead online. Located in a gas station so you can get drinks cheap. They have a loyalty card which is a plus.

name: J Richards
text:
This place is ruining the Papa Johns name!!!
Papa Johns is my favorite pizza but this place is literally driving business away. Unorganized, not enough employees, no manager or responsible party, always …More

name: Wesley Felice
text: I ordered a pizza two hours ago and it is still not here. I called the store an hour into the wait and they told me they only had one driver. They could have at least called and told me they were going to be late. They told me they would …More

name: Dan Fonnesbeck
text: Will never go to Papa John's again. Especially at this location. Completely disorganized. Had to wait for 2 hours 1 pizza (online order, which I went to pickup). It was busy the night I went, but the obvious lack of organization and …More

name: Esperanza Martinez
text: I'll admit I was in a pissy mood when I got there and then no one was at the counter so I was even more aggravated after a few minutes wait. When someone did realize I was there they gave me my order on the house. It's stupid but it made my day. Thanks guys, above and beyond!

name: Nicole Ziebach
text: Friendly employees and quick at getting pizzas made

name: Yessie Johnson
text: Trying to order online and the page is unavailable. When I call to order, the auto message just repeats...

name: EmceeRad
text: This is local to me and a unique style place, they do things different than other pizza places, it seems they are not afraid to invent at all, they are not afraid to be a bit different, I do not like the sauce or dough as much as other places, but this is my wifes favorite pizza establishment. She loves the breadsticks

name: Brent Taft
text: Good pizza, but it was hot inside the building. They have a dine in area...

name: Cameron Hendricks
text: I LOVE papa John's pizza, but because of a miscommunication over the phone, this location hung up the phone on me while I was trying to order pizza. If this isn't bad customer service, I don't know what is.

name: Melissa Poulson
text: Walked in to order and it is a 30 minute wait. Delivery was 2.5 hours so I figured I’d try walk in and wow. Never again

name: Jacob Rose
text: Rude employees on the phone, won’t deliver less than a half mile away, the other store won’t deliver from 5 miles away. Absolute trash.

name: Adrienne Prince
text: This place and the one in north Ogden is a JOKE!! I have always loved papa johns but now.... Its not worth it. Last time I ordered they placed me on pick up when i said delivery and paid over the phone. The manager didnt do anything and we …More

name: Jeramy Jones
text: This place is completely unorganized. There is no manager or management to correct the problems. Complaints go unanswered and problems go I corrected. Go somewhere else if you want pizza!

name: A.R.E. Boyer
text: It doesn't seem like the staff are really doing anything productive. One of them is watching videos online.

name: T big
text: Omg so so so good

name: Paula Lund
text: I'm hungry and I'm waiting still two hours later Riverdale California? It's  Utah just Riverdale, Utah.

name: Jerica Aldred
text: Best pizza around. Those breadsticks tho!!

name: gary scott
text: Best pizza around

name: Jesse DeNoyer
text: This store is closed

name: Dan Adams
text: Pizza was great...staff was a little frantic.

name: Nate Shivers
text: Called three times in the same week at various times for carryout. At least a 2 hour wait every time. No longer will i try to place orders with this Riverdale location.

name: Nicole Ricards
text: Worst papa johns ever , should of kept it closed night managers r worthless no customer service experience, waited 3 hours for our pizza when I called for the 3rd time to cancel it the manager was a complete jerk to us and this wasn’t the first time . This location is ruining the papa Johns name

name: jon hopkins
text: Won't answer there phones doesn't show up online??? Did they close??? Several days of this. I drive by there still there. ???

name: Derek Henderson
text: Great service at this location

name: Bob
text: Good  pizza

name: Britney Pitcher
text: yummy

name: Amanda Romney
text: Had to cancel our order because it was a 2 hour wait due to no delivery drivers. Not sure how it makes the wait longer but they didn't even apologize for their terrible service. Not going there again.

name: A Random guy
text: They delivered my pizza to the wrong house the lady called me to tell me they did then they proceeded to pick it up from her and deliver it to me. How do you run a business like that will never return
